entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:09 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 2:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
